existing_features.title: Further reduce the player jet movement sensitivity in response to virtual joystick input by adjusting the joystick-to-movement mapping so that full joystick deflection produces a noticeably slower movement speed and small deflections near center produce finer control.

Add a user-adjustable joystick sensitivity control in the gameplay UI that lets the player tweak movement sensitivity without code changes, and persist the setting locally so it is retained on refresh.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow tweaking joystick sensitivity (adjust sensitivity further)

projectName: Further reduce virtual joystick movement sensitivity and add an in-game sensitivity control
